WHAT_I_DO.DEVELOPMENT_DESCRIPTION: I'm a passionate Front-end Developer with a focus on building beautiful and performant web applications. I specialize in React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.

OVER_THE_YEARS.TITLE: Over the years,
OVER_THE_YEARS.PARAGRAPH1: I've built products for companies and businesses ranging from marketing websites to complex solutions and enterprise apps with focus on fast, elegant and accessible user experiences.
OVER_THE_YEARS.PARAGRAPH2: Currently, I work at Compass.UOL as a Frontend Developer crafting thoughtful and inclusive experiences for various client companies.
OVER_THE_YEARS.PARAGRAPH3: During my working hours, I am also a front end instructor for interns joining the company.
OVER_THE_YEARS.PARAGRAPH4: In my free time, besides studying development for hours, I also work on two startups that I co-founded, <onne>ONNE</onne> and <savebys>SAVEBYS</savebys>.
OVER_THE_YEARS.PARAGRAPH5: In both startups, in addition to working in the administrative area, I play the role of UX/UI and develop the entire front-end of the applications myself.
